<small>Aramaic form: [[H8036]]</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁם‎</span><sub>864</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[2Sam.7.9|2Sam 7:9]]</sup> ==name== (√ unknown; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמה‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xli (1887), 635</sup>; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 160</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ושׁם‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***brand, mark***, compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 213, 303 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 104</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew (especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֵּׁם‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יהוה‎</span>); Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שם‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>377</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šumu***</u></abbr>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סם‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 124</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמָא‎</span>, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁם‎</span> ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 512</sup>), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Old Aramaic, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שם‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>377</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.6.4|Gen 6:4]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.12.8|Gen 12:8]] +, rarely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁםֿ‎</span> [[1Sam.8.2|1Sam 8:2]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמִי‎</span> [[Exod.3.15|Exod 3:15]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁמְךָ‎</span> [[Gen.32.9|Gen 32:9]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.31|1Kgs 18:31]] +, etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁמוֺת‎</span> (rarely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁמֹת‎</span>) [[Gen.2.20|Gen 2:20]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.6.16|Exod 6:16]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמוֺתָם‎</span> [[Num.13.4|Num 13:4]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמוֺתָן‎</span> [[Ezek.23.4|Ezek 23:4]] (twice in verse); — ***name:*** 

**1.** of river [[Gen.2.11|Gen 2:11]]; [[Gen.2.13|Gen 2:13]]; [[Gen.2.14|Gen 2:14]], beasts v[[Gen.2.19|Gen 2:19]] v[[Gen.2.20|Gen 2:20]], city [[Gen.26.33|Gen 26:33]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]) +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎היּוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.24.2|Ezek 24:2]], i.e. exact designation of it (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתעֶֿצֶם הַיּ‎</span>). 

**2. a.** usually of person: [[Gen.4.17|Gen 4:17]]; [[Gen.4.19|Gen 4:19]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]) +; as significant [[1Sam.25.25|1Sam 25:25]], compare [[Prov.21.24|Prov 21:24]] especially in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְהִי אִישׁ ֗֗֗ וּשְׁמוֺ אֶלְקָנָה‎</span> [[1Sam.1.1|1Sam 1:1]], compare [[1Sam.9.1|1Sam 9:1]]; [[1Sam.9.2|1Sam 9:2]], [[Jer.37.13|Jer 37:13]] + 28 t.; less often as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּלְיָת שְׁמוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.17.4|1Sam 17:4]], compare [[Zech.6.12|Zech 6:12]] + 5 t. (compare in Assyrian [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]<sup>BAS i. 430</sup>); frequently with  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא‎</span> (q. v. **6**, and **Niph\`al 2, Pu\`al**; ==note here==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְרָא שׁ‎</span> in token of ownership [[2Sam.12.28|2Sam 12:28]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), [[Isa.4.1|Isa 4:1]]); rarely, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים אֶתשְֿׁמוֺ אֲבִימֶלֶךְ‎</span> [[Judg.8.31|Judg 8:31]], compare [[2Kgs.17.34|2Kgs 17:34]]; [[Neh.9.7|Neh 9:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫שֶׂם לָהֶם שׁ‎</span> [[Dan.1.7|Dan 1:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵאָמֵר‎</span> [[Gen.32.29|Gen 32:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); change of name is without verb, as [[Gen.17.15|Gen 17:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), or (usually) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִהְיֶה‎</span> [[Gen.35.10|Gen 35:10]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***Israel shall be thy name.*** compare [[Gen.17.5|Gen 17:5]]; [[1Kgs.18.31|1Kgs 18:31]]; [[1Chr.22.9|1Chr 22:9]], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַסֵּב אֶתשְֿׁמוֺ יְהו‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.34|2Kgs 23:34]] = [[2Chr.36.4|2Chr 36:4]], compare [[2Kgs.24.17|2Kgs 24:17]], and (suj. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלָם אֶתֶּןלֿוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.56.5|Isa 56:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהשְּֿׁמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Gen.32.28|Gen 32:28]], compare [[Exod.3.13|Exod 3:13]]; [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִית שְׁמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Judg.13.17|Judg 13:17]] ***be explicitly mentioned*** is: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכֻלָּם בְּשֵׁמוֺת‎</span> [[Ezra.10.16|Ezra 10:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְּבוּ בְשׁ‎</span> [[Num.1.17|Num 1:17]]; [[1Chr.16.41|1Chr 16:41]]; [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]]; [[2Chr.31.10|2Chr 31:10]]; [[Ezra.8.20|Ezra 8:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבָּאִים בְּשׁ‎</span> [[1Chr.4.38|1Chr 4:38]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָבזֹם בְּשׁ‎</span> v[[1Chr.4.41|1Chr 4:41]] of things, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְשֵׁמוֺת תִּקְדוּ‎</span> [[Num.4.32|Num 4:32]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), + v[[Num.4.27|Num 4:27]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשֵׁמֹת‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Baen|Baen]] [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְדַעְתִּיךָ בְּשֵׁם‎</span> [[Exod.33.12|Exod 33:12]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), i.e. acknowledge thee, personally (as mine), compare v[[Exod.33.17|Exod 33:17]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשׁ‎</span> ***as the representative of*** [[1Sam.25.5|1Sam 25:5]]; [[1Sam.25.9|1Sam 25:9]]; [[1Kgs.21.8|1Kgs 21:8]]; [[Jer.29.25|Jer 29:25]]; [[Esth.2.22|Esth 2:22]]; [[Esth.3.12|Esth 3:12]]; [[Esth.8.8|Esth 8:8]] (twice in verse); [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]] (compare also **3**). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** = ***reputation***; (1) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲגַדְּלָה שְׁמֶ֫ךָ‎</span> [[Gen.12.2|Gen 12:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּדוֺל כְּשֵׁם הַגְּדֹלִים אֲשֶׁר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָשִׂתִי לִךָ שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאָרֶץ‎</span> [[2Sam.7.9|2Sam 7:9]] ***make oneself a name*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנַעֲשֶׂח לָנוּ שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.11.4|Gen 11:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעַשׂ לוֺ שׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.8.13|2Sam 8:13]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Jer.32.20|Jer 32:20]], hence [[Neh.9.10|Neh 9:10]]; [[Dan.9.15|Dan 9:15]]; [[Isa.63.12|Isa 63:12]]; [[Isa.63.14|Isa 63:14]], so with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּם‎</span> [[2Sam.7.23|2Sam 7:23]] = [[1Chr.17.21|1Chr 17:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּצֵא לָךְ שֵׁם בְּ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.14|Ezek 16:14]] (compare [[1Chr.14.17|1Chr 14:17]]), [[2Chr.26.15|2Chr 26:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדלְֿמֵרָחוֺק‎</span>, v[[2Chr.26.8|2Chr 26:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּלֶךְ שְׁמוֺ עַדלְֿ‎</span>; [[2Sam.23.18|2Sam 23:18]]; [[2Sam.23.22|2Sam 23:22]] = ***fame, glory***, [[Zeph.3.19|Zeph 3:19]]; [[Zeph.3.20|Zeph 3:20]]; [[Ezek.39.13|Ezek 39:13]]. — [[Ezek.34.29|Ezek 34:29]] read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלֹם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Be|Be]] Toy; [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלֵם‎</span>; [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֵן‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַנְשֵׁי הַשֵּׁם‎</span> [[Gen.6.4|Gen 6:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Num.16.2|Num 16:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַנְשֵׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁמוֺת‎</span> [[1Chr.5.24|1Chr 5:24]]; [[1Chr.12.31|1Chr 12:31]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.30|1Chr 12:30]]); with negative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְלִישֵֿׁ‎</span> [[Job.30.3|Job 30:3]] (2) bad sense, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהוֺצִא עָלָיהָ שֵׁם רָ֑ע‎</span> [[Dan.22.14|Dan 22:14]] compare [[Dan.22.19|Dan 22:19]]; [[Neh.6.13|Neh 6:13]] = ***byword*** [[Ezek.23.10|Ezek 23:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טְמֵאַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.5|Ezek 22:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** especially as giving a man kind of posthumous life, especially in his sons, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵיןלִֿי בֵן בֵּעֲבוּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזְכֵּיר שְׁמִי‎</span> [[2Sam.18.18|2Sam 18:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהָקִים לְאָחִיו שֵׁם בְּ‎</span> [[Deut.25.7|Deut 25:7]], compare v[[Deut.25.6|Deut 25:6]]; [[Ruth.4.5|Ruth 4:5]]; [[Ruth.4.10|Ruth 4:10]], without whom it is blotted out, etc., [[Deut.25.6|Deut 25:6]], compare [[Num.27.4|Num 27:4]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ruth.4.10|Ruth 4:10]], so that to destroy one's name = extirpate family (and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁם‎</span> sometimes Is \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶרַע‎</span>) [[1Sam.24.22|1Sam 24:22]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]] v.[[1Sam.24.21|1Sam 24:21]]), [[2Sam.14.7|2Sam 14:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֵרִית‎</span>), so of peoples [[Deut.7.24|Deut 7:24]]; [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]]; [[Deut.12.3|Deut 12:3]]; [[Isa.14.22|Isa 14:22]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאֹ יִוָּרַע מִשִּׁמְךָ עוֺד‎</span> [[Nah.1.14|Nah 1:14]] (of Nineveh); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּן יַעֲמֹד זַרְעֲכֶם וְשִׁמְכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.66.22|Isa 66:22]] more abstract (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֵכֶר‎</span>) [[Job.18.17|Job 18:17]]; [[Prov.10.7|Prov 10:7]]. 

**3.** ***name***, as designation of God, specifically of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (especially Jeremiah, Ezekiel, [[BDB#Isa|Isa]]<sup>2,3</sup>, Psalms): — first (in Hexateuch) in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.4.26|Gen 4:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), ***call with***, i.e. use the name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> in worship, so [[Gen.12.8|Gen 12:8]]; [[Gen.13.4|Gen 13:4]]; [[Gen.21.33|Gen 21:33]]; [[Gen.26.35|Gen 26:35]] + (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרא‎</span> **2 c**); ==hence, of place of worship==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָלהַֿמָּקוֺם אֲשֶׁר אַוְּכִּיר מאתשְֿׁמִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> [[Exod.20.24|Exod 20:24]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]] v[[Exod.20.21|Exod 20:21]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתשְֿׁמוֺ שָׁם‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשַׁכֵּן‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָשׂוּם‎</span> [[Deut.12.5|Deut 12:5]]; [[Deut.12.11|Deut 12:11]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּנָה בַּיִת לִשְׁמִי‎</span> [[2Sam.7.13|2Sam 7:13]] + often; people come <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁ‎</span> [[Josh.9.9|Josh 9:9]] ([[BDB#R|R]]<sup>D</sup>), so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמֵעַן שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.41|1Kgs 8:41]] = [[2Chr.6.32|2Chr 6:32]]; [[Isa.60.9|Isa 60:9]] seek it [[Ps.83.17|Ps 83:17]] ***swear with*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.20.42|1Sam 20:42]]; [[Deut.6.13|Deut 6:13]]; [[Deut.10.20|Deut 10:20]]; [[Lev.19.12|Lev 19:12]], compare (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַשָּׁוְא‎</span>) [[Exod.20.7|Exod 20:7]] (twice in verse)=[[Deut.5.11|Deut 5:11]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּפַשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.30.9|Prov 30:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְרָא שְׁמִיעַלֿ‎</span>, etc., in token of ownership (compare **2 a**), [[Jer.7.10|Jer 7:10]] + ; = his reputation, fame, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׁה לוֺ‎</span>, see **1 b** (1), compare [[Josh.7.9|Josh 7:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשׁ‎</span>, i.e. as his representative [[Exod.5.23|Exod 5:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.17.45|1Sam 17:45]]; [[Deut.10.8|Deut 10:8]]; [[2Sam.6.18|2Sam 6:18]]; [[2Kgs.2.24|2Kgs 2:24]] + (see **2 a** ***near the end***); especially as embodying the (revealed) character of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Amos.5.8|Amos 5:8]]; [[Amos.9.6|Amos 9:6]]; [[Jer.33.2|Jer 33:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶה שְּׁמִי לְעֹלָם‎</span> [[Exod.3.15|Exod 3:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֵכֶר‎</span>; fundamental passage), [[Exod.6.3|Exod 6:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎) עְבָאוֺת שְׁמוֺ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Amos.4.13|Amos 4:13]]; [[Amos.5.27|Amos 5:27]]; [[Jer.10.16|Jer 10:16]]; [[Jer.46.18|Jer 46:18]] + 10 t. Jeremiah, [[BDB#Isa|Isa]]<sup>2</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַנָּא שְׁמוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Exod.34.14|Exod 34:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; compare [[Exod.20.5|Exod 20:5]]; [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדוֺשׁ שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.57.15|Isa 57:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺ‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדְשִׁי‎</span> [[Amos.2.7|Amos 2:7]]; [[Ezek.39.7|Ezek 39:7]]; [[Ezek.43.7|Ezek 43:7]]; [[Ps.103.1|Ps 103:1]] + often; hence object of knowledge [[Isa.52.6|Isa 52:6]]; [[Jer.48.17|Jer 48:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֹדְעֵי שְׁמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.9.11|Ps 9:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֹּרְשֶׁיךָ‎</span>), love [[Isa.56.5|Isa 56:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֲבֵי שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.5.12|Ps 5:12]]; [[Ps.69.37|Ps 69:37]]; [[Ps.119.132|Ps 119:132]], fear [[Ps.61.6|Ps 61:6]], especially of praise, etc. (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִלֵּל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִןכִּיר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺדָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּרַח‎</span>, etc.): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשִׁמְךָ אֲוַמֵּר‎</span> [[2Sam.22.50|2Sam 22:50]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺדְךָ‎</span> and so very often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) = [[Ps.18.50|Ps 18:50]], compare [[1Chr.16.10|1Chr 16:10]]; [[1Chr.29.13|1Chr 29:13]]; [[Ps.45.18|Ps 45:18]]; [[Isa.26.13|Isa 26:13]]; [[1Kgs.8.33|1Kgs 8:33]]; [[1Kgs.8.35|1Kgs 8:35]] = [[2Chr.6.24|2Chr 6:24]]; [[2Chr.6.26|2Chr 6:26]]; [[Ps.8.2|Ps 8:2]]; [[Ps.8.10|Ps 8:10]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבוֺד שְׁמוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבוּלי‎</span> [[Ps.29.2|Ps 29:2]]; [[Ps.96.8|Ps 96:8]], and many comibinations; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִלֵּל אֶתשֿׁ‎</span> [[Lev.18.21|Lev 18:21]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקב שׁ‎</span> [[Lev.24.16|Lev 24:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִאֵץ שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.74.10|Ps 74:10]]; [[Ps.74.18|Ps 74:18]], etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנִּכְבָּד וְהַנּוֺרָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> [[Deut.28.58|Deut 28:58]], compare [[Neh.1.11|Neh 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעַן שִׁמְךָ‎</span>, in appeals to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> to act according to his character [[Jer.14.7|Jer 14:7]]; [[Jer.14.21|Jer 14:21]]; [[Ezek.20.9|Ezek 20:9]]; [[Ezek.20.14|Ezek 20:14]]; [[Isa.48.9|Isa 48:9]]; [[Isa.66.5|Isa 66:5]]; [[Ps.25.11|Ps 25:11]]; [[Ps.31.4|Ps 31:4]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> is powerful agent, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׁמְךָ הוֺשִׁיעֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.54.3|Ps 54:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּגְבוּרָֽתְךָ‎</span>), compare [[Ps.124.8|Ps 124:8]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְאַךָ י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> says <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּקִרְבּוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.23.21|Exod 23:21]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֵּׁם‎</span> [[Lev.24.11|Lev 24:11]] is probably scribal substitution for word <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (already beginning to be thought ineffable, especially with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִקֹּב‎</span> compare [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Urschr.273 f.</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]] [[BDB#Baen|Baen]]); on development of this usage, and Jewish use of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁ‎</span> as personified or hypostasis, see [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB under the word</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>s.see</sup> — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרוֺב שְׁמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.75.2|Ps 75:2]] is striking, but doubtful, &lt; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Dy|Dy]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרְאֵי שׁ‎</span>, [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָנוּ בִשׁ‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָאנוּ‎</span>). 

**4.** of false gods, use forbidden [[Exod.23.13|Exod 23:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.23.7|Josh 23:7]] ([[BDB#R|R]]<sup>D</sup>), compare [[Hos.2.19|Hos 2:19]]; [[Ps.16.4|Ps 16:4]]speak <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשֵׁם אלהים אחרים‎</span> [[Deut.18.20|Deut 18:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא בְשׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.24|1Kgs 18:24]]; [[1Kgs.18.25|1Kgs 18:25]]; [[1Kgs.18.26|1Kgs 18:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵלְכוּ בְשׁ‎</span> [[Mic.4.5|Mic 4:5]]. 

**5.** = ***memorial, monument*** [[Isa.55.13|Isa 55:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺת‎</span>; so [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] &gt; = ***fame*** [[BDB#Di|Di-Kit]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָד וָשֵׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺב מִבָּנִים וגו‎</span> [[Isa.56.5|Isa 56:5]] (with word-play on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> **1 c**).
